website_summaries.verdict: Colorful edges with handy measurement marks along the sides provide accuracy.
pros: The set comes with three mats: two half-sheet mats and one quarter sheet mat
Silicone over fiberglass mesh construction facilitates even heating
The clear silicone and bright edges look great
cons: Though advertised for toaster ovens, some models apply too much direct heat and discolor the mat

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!  coming apart
customer_reviews.text: This is the first review I ever felt compelled to write... This is how bad it is. I only had it for a few weeks and used it a couple of times. I have been using silicon mats for years. Never have I had seen this before. Not only these mats are already stained,but they are coming apart. The paint is peeling off at the edges which makes it dangerous to cook with as I don't want any leaching into food.
customer_reviews.author: Maeva

customer_reviews.title: They DO absorb smells and tastes...
customer_reviews.text: The description says to simply wipe off, or that they can be placed in the top rack of a dishwasher, however they fail to mention that these mats DO absorb smells and tastes. After washing them in the top rack of the dishwasher, and using them later, I could taste detergent on the chicken nuggets that i heated up that were placed on one of these mats. On another mat that I washed washed with hot water wiped down, I could still smell the baked zucchini and carrots I had made a few days prior. Would NOT recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: djamo

customer_reviews.title: Flawed
customer_reviews.text: The colored borders can't withstand heat like the rest of the mat as you can see in my photos. I only used them a handful of times.
customer_reviews.author: spicyorange

customer_reviews.title: Weird taste in food
customer_reviews.text: I've used these mats for about a week, and I agree that they're easy to clean, but they leave a very strange plastic/chemical taste in your food. I have never used them above 425 degrees, and made sure to wash them well before using them. No one answered my earlier question about this, and the company hasn't responded, so I'm not sure if this is a common experience, but I won't be using them any more.
customer_reviews.author: Ektaati

customer_reviews.title: Leaves plastic taste in foods
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend, I washed them thoroughly when they arrived and have never used them at temps over 400 deg F and all of the foods I've cooked on them have a distinctively plastic taste to them.
customer_reviews.author: HiAltMama

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, beyond words.....
customer_reviews.text: I have never baked with silicone mats before. I've used the standard tin foil and even parchment paper. What an amazing difference! Now I'm looking forward to trying many new recipes, and seeing what these mats can and can not do for me. As an at home cook, I highly recommend these versatile mats. Once you start using them, you WILL wonder how you ever did without them.
customer_reviews.author: Jean C MOulton

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I expected more versitality and ease of clean from the product. Unable to clean off the stain from baking marinated chicken. Wont even consider using high temperature candy baking. We have already switched back to use of aluminum foil. Should have purchased new baking pans for the same cost. *There is an extenesive list of ways to use and NOT Use or Do with the product. Good luck getting my teenage son to follow the list after baking a simple after school pizza. He baked using them, difficluty using pizza slicer on plate and left me to clean so the product would not be damanged.
customer_reviews.author: Whovian

customer_reviews.title: One mat fits all!
customer_reviews.text: These mats are great for any type of baking/cooking! Taking out the middle man of needing to buy nonstick cooking spray, parchment paper or tin foil for the bottom of pans. Easy to wash with soap and warm water, they are not dishwasher safe. One thing to note is the heat, I was cooking chicken in the oven and wanted to add a golden brown to the top. Therefore turned the over to broil. One of the mats started burning, I read the heat warning after the fact! Operator error!
customer_reviews.author: Themomofboys

customer_reviews.title: Starting to not look good
customer_reviews.text: Had it for almost a month now...had to knock it down to 3 stars... for some reason, it is getting stained. I cook meat or fish on it at 350 ...now there is just a dark stain around where the meat was. Washed the mat a few times and the stain is on there for good. Hope it doesnt effect the efficacy.. to be continued. Original: Used it to bake chicken and the drippings and seasonings wiped off with ease. Cant wait to try it out with cookies. Will update once I use it a few more times
customer_reviews.author: J-me

customer_reviews.title: Works as good as parchment paper...love the product
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I've used them almost everyday since I have gotten them. Nothing sticks and the food is crispy and not soggy. I have made zucchini balls with panko, mozzarella sticks and meatballs. They are all crisp. Overall easy to clean, cause nothing sticks. My only complaint and why I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that they seem to stain easily. After the 3rd use there is discoloration on the mat. I have tried to clean it off, but can't. I have not put anything acidic on the mat so I don't why there is a discoloration. But I love the way they work. I would buy them again, especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shanowell

customer_reviews.title: This is a must for any house
customer_reviews.text: Love these silicone mats. I do not recommend using them for temp. over 450 degrees because it will kind of burn them a little bit. No more burnt cookies since using them and Ive had them for about 2 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Every bit as good as Silpat for MUCH less!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 3 pack at Costco to see if they were as good as my Silpats that needed replacement. They had the round cookie placement areas which turned out to be helpful, though when I went back to get a second set, all gone. So I came on Amazon and found this set, minus the spacing circles, not a big deal. These are fabulous and work just as good as Silpat for much less! Also I haven’t seen the smaller quarter sheet size from Silpat. I am completely happy!
customer_reviews.author: D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: SilChef Baking Mats - A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I truly had no idea that I would love these SilChef baking mats so much! The various sizes allow me to use the mats with different baking sheets, as well as glass casserole dishes. They clean up very easily, and so far no staining of the mat. The greatest feature for me, is the ease of cleaning up! I do not cook without my SilChef now! I would highly recommend this product as a must have in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: KD Quinn

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Love these! Baking fries & sweet potato fries using no oil! Totally non-stick! No more foil! No more mess! I'm considering giving these to everyone in my family for Christmas this year! Someone commented on storage - that best way to store is roll up and put into an empty paper towel roll - great advice - we do that! An empty toilette paper roll is perfect for the small one! I'm glad someone shared that info!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ann

customer_reviews.title: So glad I finally bought these!
customer_reviews.text: I have debated for so long about getting these mats and I finally did. These are wonderful! No more parchment paper liners for me. They fit flat in the pan. Cookies do not spread to the edge or to each other. Then pan stays completely clean and the mats clean up easily. I love these mats. If you are on the fence, trust me, you won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Mars work as advertised! Baked cookies for the first time and loved that I just placed the mat on the baking pan, put spoonfuls of cookie dough and 12 minutes later cookies were done! No oil or cooking spray used and cookies came off easily to be placed on cooling rack! No more parchment paper waste! Happy with first use and will update with long term use to see if Mats hold well with long term use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged before use
customer_reviews.text: The one sheet I did use worked well. However, I didn’t even get to use the other two. I store my pans underneath my oven in the warming drawer. I had my oven on 350 to cook for 20 minutes. I washed the mat I used which looked traffic. I went to put it back in the drawers with the others and I found them discolored with paint coming off. Very disappointed as I had been saving up to purchase these because of the good reviews
customer_reviews.author: JenniferC

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is good quality and there is nothing wrong with it
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good quality and there is nothing wrong with it. But if you’re looking to use this to replace aluminum foil then this type of product is not best as grease/food waste/etc. spreads to the sides and can go under while cooking, defeating the purpose of using something to protect/cover the pan/baking sheet
customer_reviews.author: Lexia

customer_reviews.title: Good, for the most part
customer_reviews.text: A decent replacement for parchment paper, to be sure - they're also easy to clean, for the most part, but now after using them a few times they do have some unremovable stains. Is that just the life of a silicone mat? I suppose that in theory we all become stained eventually, so I can't hold that entirely against the mat for taking on a little bit of its environment.
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: Much better than parchment paper or foil
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of throwing out foil or parchment paper every time I broiled fish, chicken etc. so decided to try these. The small size is perfect for coking for 1 or 2. They are very easy to clean, seem like they will last a long time, keep the pans under neath clean. They are also non-stick. And in the long run I will produce a lot less waste (re: parchment paper or foil).
customer_reviews.author: margot

customer_reviews.title: Very awesome for baking and freezing food.
customer_reviews.text: These baking mats are SO FABULOUS for making cookies, crescent rolls, pigs in a blanket. Nothing sticks to them. Food literally slides right off. They are super easy to clean and also work really good for food prep. I individually freeze chicken breast or hamburger patties then put them in a ziplock ones they are frozen. The meat doesnt stick to them like it would anything else. Must have kitchen item!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: No more sticking!
customer_reviews.text: Good silicone mats, great for rolling out cookie dough, cutting pastry strips for pies and baking. They're easy to wash in warm soapy water and easy to store (just don't fold them). They have a silicone-y smell when you first get them but it goes away after a couple washes. I just wish they came in bigger sizes. So much easier lifting cookie dough off these bad boys.
customer_reviews.author: OceanHips

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY WHAT WAS EXPECTED
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I expected. Bright colors, easy usage, solid build. For those complaining about discoloring, you obviously have not used Silpat. These are a fine replacement for those and behave similarly. Only time will tell if they last as long or longer, but pretty happy so far. Holding off on final star ONLY because I don't know how long they will last.... Okay, revision. Bumping up extra star. Made repeat purchase.... they far outlasted my silpat. First order now used solely for meats and new order solely for baking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I've baked several things including cheese with no sticking. Clean up us easy if you follow the included directions. I'm being careful not to bend or nick the surface to keep it for as long as possible. It also has helped us to continue using one of our older sheet pans without the waste of foil or parchment.
customer_reviews.author: Makeda

customer_reviews.title: Work great, much cheaper than parchment paper.
customer_reviews.text: So far these are great. A lot safer to cook on, and that was my biggest concern. I'm also spending much less on parchment paper, so that's a great bonus. I've also noticed that things aren't as greasy when I use these. When the food is cooking, more grease seems to come out around the food which is always nice if you're looking to save a few calories here and there.
customer_reviews.author: HaleyK

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product if your trying to cut down on the kitchen waist. The only thing is that they don’t allow things to get crisp on the bottom so I’d say flip things half way through but other than that they are good.
customer_reviews.author: jenna larbig

customer_reviews.title: Don't fit the pans correctly...what a pain.
customer_reviews.text: They work well but none of the mats seem to fit my standard size pans quite right. They're all just a tad too big which is so aggravating! They're a pain to wash and dry too but that's not the products fault. My gripe is with the size. I've had other silicone mats before and they fit my pans perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy-the-Crow

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, stick-free, and less mess!!!
customer_reviews.text: These mats are my go-to baking tool. This is my second set, the first are my own and are still going strong after several years, this set is for a gift. They are sturdy, wash up well, and make clean up a breeze. I try and cook healthy with little or no oil and these sheets allow me to bake anything from portobello mushrooms, to oil-free cookies without sticking to the pan. They survive high temperature cooking with oven fries at 475 as well as moderate temperature baking. I even use them to roll fresh spring rolls and sweet rolls when I need a non-stick surface. You will enjoy these.
customer_reviews.author: c.j.

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: Nothing sticks. We have baked cookies twice since purchasing them. The recipe we used called for no oil (3 simple ingredients - oats, bananas, walnuts). The cookies cooked all the way through and were easily removed from the sheets. Worked better than parchment paper which is a plus since it is not recyclable. Really glad to have found these.
customer_reviews.author: MsCoachBee

customer_reviews.title: Good sizes and it crisps your food!
customer_reviews.text: Good value for 2 half pan and (1) 1/4 size and love the colors. These work great. I'm cutting down on fried foods and use these to make crispy french fries out of the oven. They work great! Seriously crispy. Don't use any oil on these silicone pads. Easy to wash with soap and water. I always wash by hand. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This is my designated macaron mat set and I've used it twice; so far, so good. It does what it's supposed to do. I love how my macarons have a uniform flat base when compared to using parchment paper. Cheaper than Silpat. The smallest one doesn't fit my toaster oven but that's OK. Will buy more for future use.
customer_reviews.author: MissB

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I've never used silicone baking mat before, so I don't have anything to compare these to. They arrived in perfect condition, and performed well with the batch of cookies I baked. They fit the pans I bought them for. And it's fun having the three different colors. I like brightly colored kitchen items.
customer_reviews.author: OkieGirl

customer_reviews.title: Helpful to avoid extra oil
customer_reviews.text: These are a great way to roast without adding extra oil to your food. We made potato "fries" last night and they were excellent. No sticking or burning. I'm using these to replace parchment paper or foil. I've only used them a few times so far but they were easy to clean and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Erin L

customer_reviews.title: Useful and great quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set that I buy. I loved the first one and this is a gift for a dear friend who I know will appreciate and enjoy. They are easy to use, clean and store. The quality of the material and the design are just great. The different sizes come in handy. Totally recommendable.
customer_reviews.author: jlinaresmx

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy these sooner? They are perfection and make baking and cleaning up so much easier. I no longer need to spray or oil my baking sheets. These clean up easily and store rolled up to take up very little space. A+
customer_reviews.author: NicoleR

customer_reviews.title: Great mats!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing sticks to these! They do stain a bit but that's not really an issue. Made oil free pumpkin "cookies" on these mats and they did not stick at all. You do have to put it on a metal baking sheet for stability.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Nargundkar

customer_reviews.title: Clean up was a breeze!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mats! I use them for cookies, meatballs, mini pizzas etc. and it all cooks evenly every time:) Will purchase more soon. The only thing is they have to be stored flat and nothing on top of them. I have limited space and would have loved if they came in their own storage box.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: HUGE time saver!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I've been using them for over a year and they still look like new. Clean up is a breeze, no matter what kind of mess we make on them. I was concerned that there might be some plastic taste from the use of the mats, but haven't noticed anything -- even with high temp / extended baking.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for three years, loved that it included a different size, great product and quality. Until a few months ago, where one of them burnt in the oven at 400F, while it's suppose to withstand higher temperatures (482F). Regardless of that mishap, I think it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Easy Cleanup!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these baking mats. Simply place them on the pan, and you're good to go! The food is easy to remove after it's baked. Then all you have to do is wash them in soapy water. I've made jalapeño poppers and baked cookies on them, and they did exactly what they were supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Debby Mayne

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Use these almost everyday. They truly are nonstick and easy to clean. I have noticed something slightly stained one of my mats but no big deal. I wish I hadn't waited as long as I did to buy these!
customer_reviews.author: missliz007

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how I did without them
customer_reviews.text: These mats work very well in the oven or in the freezer. They are easy to clean. In order to store them, I wait for them to dry completely (you are not supposed to dry them with a towel) and then roll them all up together in a rubber band and put them in a drawer. They don't retain the curl from rolling up, but lay flat in the pan every time. Just what I was hoping for. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: CindyTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: So useful
customer_reviews.text: My daughter-in-law uses these mats for lots of cooking and I decided to get some myself. Roasted veggies are a snap on a baking sheet and one of these sheets. I am sure I will find many other uses.
customer_reviews.author: jumpmom

customer_reviews.title: Good for lining cookie sheets for ease of cleaning
customer_reviews.text: The product description said that these would help in not burning the bottoms of baked goods but that isn't true. Had I not peeked in at my cookies when I did, they would have been in the trash...... oh well, at least my cookie sheets are easier to clean because of these.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Bean

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Easy to clean, by hand in warm soapy water. Makes the clean up of using a baking sheet so much nicer! Distributes heat evenly so my cookies turn out really well. Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: After a mishap with my last silicone liners I needed something fast. I love the colors and these work great. What I didn't realize was that the two big ones were the same size. For me, that worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Ryotte Ann

customer_reviews.title: Use every time I use the oven
customer_reviews.text: I haven't bought aluminum foil since purchasing these. I absolutely love these mats. They are non-stick and they are super easy to use and clean. I throw them in the dishwasher and done. Will purchase again if needed. I've had mine for over a year and they still work great.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I have long used parchment paper to keep from ruining my baking pans, but I have been hearing and seeing numerous chefs using baking mats. The mats from Silchef are wonderful! They function exactly as advertised. They are easy to clean, and most importantly, the baked goods come out perfectly. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: MLD

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I disliked was I thought they would be more rugged so they could be used without having to use something under them. They clean up great. Overall they are a great product
customer_reviews.author: theresa p.

customer_reviews.title: I love them. have even shown my friends
customer_reviews.text: I read about these on some obscure faceb0ok post. I love them. have even shown my friends. We use hem all the time when we bake anything. Put them on top of cookie sheets. Clean up is so easy. No waste
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Food comes right off!
customer_reviews.text: I love these mats! I used them to bake something that had cheese on it and the cheese peeled right off with the food! There was not a need to do any scrubbing or anything just a simple wash cloth with soap did the trick to get it clean and ready to use again!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Good product with nice features at an OK price
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to replace a worn out Silpat. This set won over the amazon basic set due to the toaster oven mat and the rulers on each mat. We've used them twice and so far and they work very well. We did notice a similar set (different manufacturer) on-sale ($4 less) at Costco, but we prefer these because the rulers come in handy for those weird times you need a ruler in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kinger7102

customer_reviews.title: Horrible do not buy !!!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe used 3 times and it’s completely black and burnt. Obviously not for baking makes your food smell and taste like burnt I wanted to use this so I can switch from using aluminum foil but this is worse ! Very disappointed in this product complete waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: jv

customer_reviews.title: The mats have a chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I've decided to stop using parchment papers and use reusable mats instead, and the colors and sizes seemed nice. Unfortunately, these mats came with a strong smell. I've tried washing them by hand and in the dishwasher but it doesn't help.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These mats are heavy and tacky. They lie flat on the baking sheet and stay in place, unlike a much thinner silicon mat I have been using. I can the smaller mat in a 9 1/2" x 13" pan, supplemented with a piece of parchment paper or aluminum foil.
customer_reviews.author: Kittery

customer_reviews.title: They made my food taste funny
customer_reviews.text: I ended up giving these away, because they made my food taste funny - almost like soap. I tried them multiple times with the same result, even after ensuring I rinsed them thoroughly after washing. Maybe my taste buds are off? I gave two stars instead of one because they are definitely effective as nonstick mats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Baking Cookies
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the sizes in the set of 3 silicone baking mats. I've used them for baking cookies and marinated salmon. Both were easy to remove from the mat in a cookie sheet and super easy to clean. I haven't tried the dishwasher yet, but I expect it to clean them just as good as washing them by hand. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Great for all your baking
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They can be thrown in the dishwasher without losing their ability to keep items from sticking. Overtime, they can become slightly discolored but that doesn’t seem to effect their functionality. I use these any time I bake anything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool for improving baking.
customer_reviews.text: Surface is easy to clean. They are pretty. They keep the cookies from burning and they all get done at thy he same yime.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these and helpful for reducing waste
customer_reviews.text: I love these things! They have been awesome for lining trays while cooking/baking. Help me cut out aluminum foil and ultimately reduce my waste.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had gotten them sooner
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait until I used these mats a few times before I wrote a review. I've used them almost everyday since I received them two weeks ago and I love them! I wish I had gotten them sooner it would've saved me money and aggravation trying to cut parchment paper to the size of the pan and getting it to stay flat. Not to mention how I don't like to waste paper and packaging! Also, before having these chicken nuggets and some other foods used to stick when baked in the oven using Aluminum foil but with these mats nothing sticks and no spray is needed! Clean up is a breeze as well. I absolutely love these mats.
customer_reviews.author: passerby

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these silicone baking mats to replace a set that I already had. The Silchef mats are easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: I love to bake cookies and these are so amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love to bake cookies and these are so amazing. Without any spray or shortening the cookies come right off. They make the edges and bottoms brown more evenly and just make life easier when it comes to baking. These also are great for making tortillas. I place the dough on one then put another mat on top and roll it out. It roll out more even and doesn't stick to my rolling pin. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Okay just weird to clean. But worth it to reduce waste.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Definitely nonstick without even having to add additional oil etc. love having a reusable option- we are trying to have a zero-waste home!
customer_reviews.author: Keirstyn Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these! However they do stain and are a little hard to clean in that aspect. Otherwise they’re great!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: really works well
customer_reviews.text: baking cookies really so much easier with silicone baking mats. whoever invented them needs cookie monster thanks
customer_reviews.author: dibankker

customer_reviews.title: As great as a Silpat and USA made!
customer_reviews.text: Many years ago I had another silicone nonstick product called Silpat and loved it. This product might not be made in France but made in America is a great thing. The set of three mats are every bit as good as the Silpat plus the two extra sizes come in handy. Everything I throw at this seems to come out perfect; cookies, bread, biscuits, you name it. I'm happy! I had to replace the Silpat because a guest in my home was baking and then used it as a cutting board; apparently she did not realize that nonstick mats are not to be used as cutting boards.
customer_reviews.author: shopmanlerxt

customer_reviews.title: Pretty useful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace the use of tin foil when cooking and they work very well as far as being non-stick. The only issues I have is that I wish there were more sizes available to better fit different sheets and also that there is no lip on these so all juices from meat run under that mat making more clean up than if we would have just stuck with tin foil.
customer_reviews.author: gossimer44

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought new cookie sheet and am hoping to keep these ones from getting that baked on grease look. So far, these do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great for commercial use.
customer_reviews.text: I use a turbo chef oven at my bar. These are fantastic mats. I cook pizzas and grinder style sandwichs. No longer do I use parchment paper. The Silchef silicone mats are easy to clean and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bartow

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I got them last week and started using them asap, with the hopes of saving baking paper. I would prefer that they were 3 different sizes, however they perform pretty well
customer_reviews.author: GAC

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how convenient this is
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my pan 'sort of ' clean. If what I am cooking is liquid, liquid will just slip under this mat and it defeats the purpose of this mat. Also, so hard to clean, it is always slippery/greasy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: These are well made
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought others that were not as well made and believe me you get what you pd for.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Best value out there!
customer_reviews.text: These silicon sheets are amazing! We tried them out the day they arrived. We made Halloween cookies and every one came out perfect! No brown bottom and cooked through. Cleaned with soapy water (Dawn) and dried with paper towels then rolled up and put away. The sheets did not have burn spots like a very expensive one I had previously. I love they are BPA free and made in USA! Plus they are so much less than celebrity versions! I will be buying more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Pro- kitchen worthy product, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a trained pastry chef and was skeptical about using mats that were not Silpats. Mine have lasted for years but finally needed replacement. I took a chance on these and was pleasantly surprised. The mats are well-sized, durable so far, wash well, and have great non-stick qualities. So far they haven't stained. I use the smaller one to set down fondant pieces as I work. They shipped quickly and the seller has been so easy to work with. I would buy again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Joy A., Pennsylvania

customer_reviews.title: Makes clean up easier
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, I feel like they're even more nonstick than my name brand sil pad
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: It works but it's already turning brown
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it's supposed to do that but it already looks burnt. I've used it maybe a week, just in my toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: alita217

customer_reviews.title: YOU NEED THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. They catch the drips from Pizza and save my toaster oven bottom tray from being ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Edna Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are just plain awesome they clean well can toss in your dishwasher. This saves so much money and the planet! We are getting more!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this no longer do I need foil There’s are non stick which I love so much My issue which I don’t even care about is that they stain easily as soon as you start to use them but other then that they are awesome makes my food very crispy
customer_reviews.author: lorena herrera

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The best alternative to pricey SilPat mats. I'll never buy parchment again. Everything slides off perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn H.

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to frying !
customer_reviews.text: This is a miracle! Who knew that there was an alternative to frying like this?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are everything that the hype is about mom LOVES them!
customer_reviews.text: Mom cookes daily and she really wanted these for xmas 2017. I got em for her and she thanks me about every time she uses them nothing sticks ever! They do stain some after moderate baking but it does not effect the purpose at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ozzborn

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister who bakes a lot and she loves them. She loves that the rulers are on the sides of the sheets. Will update review once she has used them.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient and helps save money
customer_reviews.text: I remember watching episodes on Food Network where the chefs would have silicone mats for their baking pans and I was super jealous. I finally bought my own set and I'm so happy I did. They are easy to use and clean. My only problem has been trying to find a flat place to store them but it's not that big of a deal. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Decent silicone baking mats
customer_reviews.text: Good baking mats. Almost as nice as my silpat. A little unwieldy to clean, but that's all silicone mats. I like the different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Not as hardy as I had hoped. Starting to ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as hardy as I had hoped. Starting to discolor after 5 uses. While it is top shelf dishwasher safe they warn not to fold/crease, cut, or clean with scratchy pads/scrubbers. They do work well. Would not buy ones that were clear or that contained fiberglass again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the outdoors and this is perfect to pack without taking up space
customer_reviews.author: Spiritual_Mommy

customer_reviews.title: smack
customer_reviews.text: These baking mats are fantastic. Nothing sticks to them and they are a great price. I have a name brand that cost for one was more than I paid for all three of these. Also glad to have the small size. I also like the fact that the company contacted me to make sure I liked the product and that everything was ok. Can't go wrong with these mats. Use these to make cookies and it will save you a lot of works.
customer_reviews.author: sandy m

customer_reviews.title: Food Stays Moist
customer_reviews.text: Tried the smallest one on my toaster oven and I'm very pleased. Chicken breast stay nice & moist as do pork chops. Easy to clean and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: THEY REALLY WORK!
customer_reviews.text: Baked rolls for dinner. Easy...slick to use...felt like Magic. Cleanup was a breeze. Love these@
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Effective replacement for one time use parchment.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these, did take away a star because they aren’t too easy to clean, may stain
customer_reviews.author: bonnie j clancy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for their purpose.  Definitely worth using for baking.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these for baking cookies. they keep my cookie sheets clean and are easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: CLM

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up after using. Non stick!
customer_reviews.text: I have used a similar product and these silicone pads were just what I needed. I liked the 2 sizes Easy clean up non stick baking!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Price

customer_reviews.title: Great results!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these mats. I do not know why I have not tried these before now. Everything I have cooked on these have turned out to be perfectly cooked with no dark bottoms. My husband made biscuits this morning and I had left the pad out in the baking pan and he was just shocked at the results. Usually the biscuits get very dark on the bottom before they completely cook, but the bottoms were perfect. I cannot wait to cook cookies on these.
customer_reviews.author: jyllian

customer_reviews.title: Helps food cook evenly and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used silicone mats before and bought these to replace parchment paper. I love the sizes, the smaller one fits perfectly on the tray for my toaster oven. I roasted cauliflower and using the mat made the cauliflower cook evenly throughout the entire tray, a perfect golden brown on every piece!
customer_reviews.author: Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Sized and A Great Value
customer_reviews.text: The perfect set for the way I cook. They fit beautifully in my pans, have a great measuring ruler along one edge, make cleanup easy, and most importantly, I don't have to use additional fats to prevent sticking or wasteful foil. Arrived quickly and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lang

customer_reviews.title: Good price for 3 mats
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice and clean up well. I have used them quite a lot. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: No more parchment paper! Earth friendly, easy to clean. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne
